lines: 1. Ku Yimbelela Ka Tuva, Ku Khutaza Emoyeni,
Ndzi Hleketa Yesu Kreste, Ndzi Tsundzuka Galeliya.
A Ku Dzumba Yesu Kona, Galeliya Lero Xonga,
2. Ya Khuluka Wona Mati, Swinyenyani Swa Dzunisa,
Swi Tlangela Rona Siku, Hoyo-Hoyo Galeliya.
3. Ta Yesu Ndzi Ta Ku Byela, Wo Famba Henhla Ka Lwandle,
Ndzi Navela Nchumu Wun’we, Ku N’wi Landza Galeliya.
